title: Fast Forward and Rewind Box with data
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching MLB.TV
custom_steps: WHEN  I am fast forwarding or rewinding
custom_expected:
THEN I should see a box above the scrubber with the rate and direction
AND  I should see a box above the scrubber update with the elapsed time
AND I should see a box above the scrubber update with the Scores
AND  I should see a box above the scrubber update with the Inning

title: Live Game: Scrubber Display Inning Markers
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is watching Live MLB.TV content
AND the data has at least 10 seconds to load
custom_expected: THEN I should see an inning and half-inning indicators getting added on the scrubber telling me how far into the game I am currently viewing

title: Archived Game: Scrubber Display Inning Markers
custom_steps: WHEN the user is watching archive MLB.TV content
custom_expected: THEN I should see an inning and half inning indicators on the scrubber telling me how far into the game I am currently viewing

title: Play Live Video
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with a valid MLB.TV entitlement
custom_steps: WHEN I select to watch a game that is live
custom_expected:
THEN I must be shown that specific MLB.TV stream for the stream that was selected 
AND the game will start at the live point

title: Closed Caption
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching MLB.TV content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN closed captions are available for the audio feed I am listening to
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I can navigate up to access the CC option

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I Select the closed caption button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN closed captions should appear

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN closed captions are available and captions are currently enabled

AND I select the closed caption button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN closed captions should disappear

title: Fast Forward and Rewind Archived Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching archived MLB.TV content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap the forward button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the video is paused
AND I should be taken forward at the desired rate until I press play.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap the RW button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the video is paused
AND I should be taken backward at the desired rate until I press play

title: Play and Pause
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching MLB.TV content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the content is currently playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the play/pause button should indicate “Pause”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the content is currently paused
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the play/pause button should indicate “Play”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap the Pause button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the content should pause
AND the paused video should remain visible on screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap the Play button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the content should play

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I enter an MLB Stream
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I can see the controls for 5 seconds.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I am not seeing the controls 

AND I tap up or down on the circle
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the scrubber should appear on the screen

title: Scrubber Bar
custom_steps:
WHEN I watch MLB.TV content

AND I can see the scrubber
custom_expected: THEN the video continues playing and the scrubber fills in as the video progresses

title: Fast Forward and Rewind LIVE Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching Live MLB.TV content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap the forward button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the video is paused

AND I should be taken forward at the desired rate until I press play or until I reach the live point.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I tap the RW button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the video is paused

AND I should be taken backward at the desired rate until I press play or reach the beginning

title: Audio Options
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching MLB.TV content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the video controls are visible
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I can navigate up to access the audio feed options

AND I can select on the Audio Options

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN  a user has selected the Audio Options
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I can see all available audio feeds

AND I can see which feed I have currently selected.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN  a user has selected the Audio Options

AND the user selects an audio feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the new audio feed can be played without impacting the video feed

title: Display Time
custom_preconds: Given a user watching MLB.TV content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I am watching live MLB.TV content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see an indicator on the left side of the scrubber telling me how far from the start broadcast I am currently viewing

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I am watching live MLB.TV content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see a live indicator on the right side of the screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I am watching archive MLB.TV content
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should see an indicator on the right side of the scrubber telling me the duration of the broadcast I am currently viewing.

title: Video Options
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching MLB.TV content

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the video controls are visible
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I can navigate up to access the Video feed options

AND I can select on the Video Options

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN  a user has selected the Video Options
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I can see all available Video feeds

AND I can see which feed I have currently selected.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN  a user has selected the Video Options

AND the user selects a different Video feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the new Video feed plays from the same time in the game as the original feed

title: Play/Pause from Center Button
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching MLB.TV

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I am on the default controls or resting state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I can play or pause with the center button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I am fast forwarding or rewinding
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I can press the center button and start playback

title: Dark filter behind scrubber and controls
custom_preconds: GIVEN an entitled user is in MLB.TV App
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is watching a video 
AND show the Scrubber and Media Controls appears
custom_expected: THEN the user can clearly see the text and button options

title: VOD: Turn on CC
custom_preconds: GIVEN an MLB user is in MLB.TV App
custom_steps:
WHEN they are watching a VOD Video
AND closed Captions are available
custom_expected: THEN the user can turn CC on and see them on screen.

title: Outside audio app stops when video plays
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user playing audio from an outside app (eg Spotify)
custom_steps:
WHEN they enter the MLB app
AND play a video
custom_expected:
THEN the outside audio should stop
AND the audio associated with the MLB app video should play

title: Show non-game media title during playback
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is playing a non-game media clip (ie VOD, SVOD, ADHOC, SLIVE)
AND the media controls are visible on the screen
custom_expected: THEN media title is displayed on the screen

title: Resume at start after game watched to completion

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game has been watched to completion
AND the game is archived
AND the user chooses to resume the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game will start at the beginning

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a game has been watched to completion (this can include when the postgame is currently playing or there is still just postgame slate showing)
AND the game has not yet been archived
AND the user chooses to resume the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the game will start at the last place the user left the game
